name: Breast Investigators
overview:
Breast Investigators LLC, is an informational website and social network designed to provide women and men with the information they need to take action and make informed decisions about their breast health. Through offering expert knowledge, resources and the ability to connect with others on the network, members can find information on the prevention, early detection, treatment, survivorship and advocacy of breast cancer. Breast Investigators provides monthly breast self-awareness reminders, informative blogs, forum discussions, news updates, and a calendar of local and national events with the intention that network members and website visitors will gain crucial information in regard to their breast health and resources available to support them.

Network members include proactive women and men, breast cancer survivors, advocates, non-profit support organizations, in addition to health care and wellness professionals. This combination of membership allows for shared knowledge on the network creating a community connecting members.
